akas: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (original title)

akas from release info: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (original title)
La voz de tu corazón: reiniciar Spain

1.title: Space Creation; Can't See Squat

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

1.plot: With their daughter Yul-bong at home, Seok can hardly concentrate on his work and decides to work in Bu-ook's car where he gets stuck.; Ae-bong's mom gets lasik surgery and is unable to see following the procedure. Seok takes her around on piggyback for the next few days.

2.title: War of the In-laws; Your Mom Used to Be Fit

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

2.plot: Cheol-wang and Ae-bong's father both want all of Yul-bong's attention and start a battle armed with limited edition toys.; After giving birth, Ae-bong goes on a diet but somehow ends up gaining even more weight.

3.title: A Battle Against Myself; The Unbearable Weight of Dating a Cop

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

3.plot: A Seok impersonator is in town. Seok starts a battle against him.; Joon starts dating a cop. People mistake him for a criminal when they go around town while she's in uniform.

4.title: Protagonist; Limited Edition

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

4.plot: Worried that Cheol-wang is going through male menopause, Seok and Ae-bong set out on a mission titled "You are the protagonist of your life!".; Wearing an on-trend T-shirt, Seok bumps into a bunch of guys wearing the same and finds himself in a lot of awkward situations.

5.title: Sweet Honeymoon; The Night of The Living Cold

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

5.plot: Tired of babysitting, Seok and Ae-bong try to reignite their romance and go back to their honeymoon phase.; Trying to avoid the upcoming family cleaning day, Seok, Joon, and Cheol-wang attempt to get a cold by any means.

6.title: Baby & Me; Neighborhood Watch

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

6.plot: Joon has to take care of Yul-bong for a day by himself. When Yul-bong goes missing, his frantic search begins.; Fueled by a sense of justice, Ae-bong's father gives Seok, Shin, and Bu-ook special training to keep their neighborhood safe.

7.title: Forgetful Mom; Surprise Party

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

7.plot: Ae-bong is getting irritated by her forgetful mom. Seok struggles to intervene between his wife and his mother-in-law.; Seok, Shin, and Bu-ook prepare for a cosplay festival without their family's knowledge. Their family mistakenly believes that the three are planning surprise parties for them.

8.title: I'll Be Your Celebrity; A Rare Anus

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

8.plot: Dressed in a cap and mask, Seok gets mistaken for Max, a famous idol singer, and a scandal with an actress ensues.; Pieces of Yul-bong's toy get stuck in Seok's body parts. Seok strides down the street with his honking ears.

9.title: Hectic Nursing; Scouter

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

9.plot: Hospitalized with enteritis, Jung-kwon pretends that she's terminally ill to prank her sons. Worried that she will get even more depressed, however, Seok and Joon decide to play cool and act like spoiled kids as usual.; Getting a recruitment offer from other webtoon publisher, Seok disobeys his current agent whom he has a long-standing feud with, not realizing the offer is no longer valid.

10.title: My Wife's Male Friend; Party Time

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

10.plot: Bothered by Ae-bong's mysterious male friend named Young-soo, Seok steals Ae-bong's cell phone which makes her believe that their house has been burglarized.; Yul-bong's first-birthday party, Seok and Ae-bong's wedding, Ae-bong's parents' wedding vow renewals, and Joon's "I-Will-Never-Marry" ceremony are all happening on the same day. The schedule gets messed up and all the plans go awry.

1.title: The World Created by Cho Seok; Paper Human

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

1.plot: Cho Seok has made it as an established webtoonist. But his family just can't seem to differentiate themselves from their fictional portrayals.; Seok finally moves out of his parents' house. Naked and stuck in his new flat, he makes himself a "paper suit" and sets out on an adventure outside.

2.title: Mother Scrooge; How-Tos of a Long-Term Relationship

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

2.plot: Tormented by a stingy Jung-kwon, the Chos makes a plan to ditch the old sofa.; Seok and Ae-bong come to realize that they're stuck in a rut. Seok prepares a surprise event for Ae-bong, but nothing goes as planned.

3.title: 3 Idiots; How Cho Copes with Slump

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

3.plot: In their high school days, Seok, Shin, and Bu-ook tried everything to get out of school early. It seems these 3 idiots still haven't grown up.; Hitting a slump, Seok starts working on a new piece to turn this crisis into an opportunity.

4.title: War of Blind Dates; The Girlfriend's Assist

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

4.plot: Seok and Ae-bong argue over whose friends are more attractive and start a battle of blind dates to prove their point.; After getting fired from her job, Ae-bong makes an effort to be a good wife for Seok, but it only ends up torturing him.

5.title: Fluorescent Man; Doll Addiction

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

5.plot: Afraid of Ae-bong's parents, Seok secretly goes to see Ae-bong, not knowing his ass is glowing from fluorescent material.; Addicted to a claw crane, Joon accidentally drops his expensive watch inside while trying to forcibly win a doll.

6.title: A Moment to Remember; A Debt of Wishes

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

6.plot: After a small accident, Seok suffers minor amnesia. His family members go to great lengths to help him recover his memory for their respective reasons.; Seok loses a bet against Ae-bong and now owes her 97 wishes.

7.title: Wannabe YOLO; Glorious Revenge

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

7.plot: Wanting a taste of the 'YOLO' lifestyle, Cheol-wang tries to sabotage his own fried chicken shop. But then comes the unstoppable Ae-bong to rescue his business.; Joon moves out of his parents' house and steals some of Seok's home appliances. Seok comes up with a brilliant plan for revenge.

8.title: Should I Say I Love You Again; Wedding Warrior Aebong Peach

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

8.plot: After winning the lottery, Seok and Ae-bong go rogue and live if there's no tomorrow.; Thinking that Seok is not going to propose anytime soon, Ae-bong gets ready to propose to him first.

9.title: The Day After the Break-up; Meet the Chos and Chois

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

9.plot: After the breakup, Seok misses Ae-bong so much that he ends up in the hospital. Cheol-wang mistakes a bandaged stranger for Seok and brings him home.; At a formal meeting between the two families, The Chos and the Chois try to impress but intentionally disrespect each other instead.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

10.plot: Seok is frustrated at his first fan meet where only his family and one fan comes to see him. He does his best to make that one fan happy.; Seok prepares for a wonderful proposal at a hotel, but his car gets towed and he gets stuck in the countryside.

imdb.title: The Sound of Your Heart Reboot
